main event: A civilian observed a greenish ball of fire traveling in a northerly direction over Tangier, Oklahoma on April 1, 1966.
interesting points: The object made a high-pitched sound similar to a jet engine,The object was about 30 feet in diameter,It allegedly caused the observer's car to lose power,The object emitted a considerable amount of heat,The observation lasted approximately 15 seconds.
witness description: Civilian, 34 years old, barber and farmer
